idea:
Rockmetric is a 'Cognitive Data Analyst' that automates analysis over billions of rows of data with a Google-like 'Natural Language Search' interface. Large enterprises can deliver sophisticated analysis for ad-hoc queries at scale instantly, without having to expand reporting and analytics teams.

Business teams can request for queries such as “Which are the top Account Managers by Target Achievement” or “Why did the Sales for Product A dip in Mumbai during May?”. The platform automatically understands user queries, analyses data and delivers beautiful charts with descriptive insights across web, mobile, email, chat and voice.

Press: https://yourstory.com/2018/05/rockmetrics-cognitive-data-analyst-helping-businesses-analyses-insights-outcomes/
RISE Demo Day Pitch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SvmqQR61jMU
name: ROCKMETRIC INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
